We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private ParabolicStopAndReverse _psar;
// In Initialize()
_psar = PSAR(symbol,);

// In OnData()
if (_psar.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "PSAR Is Ready", _psar.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "PSAR Warm Up Period", _psar.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "PSAR Current", _psar.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "PSAR Name", _psar.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "PSAR Samples", _psar.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.psar = self.PSAR(symbol,)

# In OnData()
if self.psar.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PSAR Is Ready", self.psar.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PSAR Warm Up Period", self.psar.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PSAR Current", self.psar.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PSAR Name", self.psar.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "PSAR Samples", self.psar.Samples);
}
